name: Complimentary Movement
description:
Playable in your browser with mouse.

To move select two complimentary colors. Each complimentary pair moves to an other direction. 

Set the number of steps at the bottom of the screen.

Created solely by @code_for_joy within one week for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

Tools: Unity, C#, Photoshop, Cubase

The theme is "stronger together".
